lead_paragraph: SCOTT--Hugh J. Hunter College mourns the death of an esteemed member of its community, Hugh Scott, dean of the Hunter College Division of Programs in Education and inaugural dean of the nationally acclaimed School of Education. From 1975 until his retirement in 2000, Dr. Scott played an essential role in preparing Hunter students for the classrooms of New York City and beyond. He was admired by faculty, students and staff and was awarded the Hunter College President's Medal for his exemplary service. Contributions may be sent to the Dean Hugh Scott Scholarship Fund, Hunter College Foundation, 695 Park Avenue, New York, NY 10065. Jennifer J. Raab, President Hunter College 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SCOTT, HUGH J
